result.html: Las a súileHer eyes lit up.
result.ponchtml: Las a súileHer eyes lit up.

result.eng: The child's face lit up with joy.
result.ga: Las aghaidh an pháiste le háthas
result.orig: Las aghaidh an pháiste le háthas
result.html: Las aghaidh an pháiste le háthasThe child's face lit up with joy.
result.ponchtml: Las aġaiḋ an ṗáiste le háṫasThe child's face lit up with joy.

result.eng: He lit up a fresh cigarette and started to talk.
result.ga: Las sé toitín úr agus thosaigh ag caint
result.orig: Las sé toitín úr agus thosaigh ag caint
result.html: Las sé toitín úr agus thosaigh ag caintHe lit up a fresh cigarette and started to talk.
result.ponchtml: Las sé toitín úr agus ṫosaiġ ag caintHe lit up a fresh cigarette and started to talk.

result.html: Las sí an choinnealShe lit up the candle.
result.ponchtml: Las sí an ċoinnealShe lit up the candle.

result.html: Tá an tine lastaThe fire is lit.
result.ponchtml: Tá an tine lastaThe fire is lit.

result.eng: I know the way, lit. I have knowledge of the way.
result.html: Tá fios an bhealaigh agamI know the way, lit. I have knowledge of the way.
result.ponchtml: Tá fios an ḃealaiġ agamI know the way, lit. I have knowledge of the way.
